SkMask.h

00001 #ifndef SkMask_DEFINED
00002 #define SkMask_DEFINED
00003 
00004 #include "SkRect.h"
00005 
00010 struct SkMask {
00011         enum Format {
00012                 kBW_Format,     
00013                 kA8_Format,     
00014                 k3D_Format      
00015         };
00016 
00017         U8*                     fImage;
00018         SkRect16        fBounds;
00019         U16                     fRowBytes;
00020         U8                      fFormat;        // Format
00021 
00025         size_t computeImageSize() const;
00029         size_t computeTotalImageSize() const;
00030 
00035         U8* getAddr1(int x, int y) const
00036         {
00037                 SkASSERT(fFormat == kBW_Format);
00038                 SkASSERT(fBounds.contains(x, y));
00039                 SkASSERT(fImage != nil);
00040                 return fImage + ((x - fBounds.fLeft) >> 3) + (y - fBounds.fTop) * fRowBytes;
00041         }
00046         U8* getAddr(int x, int y) const
00047         {
00048                 SkASSERT(fFormat != kBW_Format);
00049                 SkASSERT(fBounds.contains(x, y));
00050                 SkASSERT(fImage != nil);
00051                 return fImage + x - fBounds.fLeft + (y - fBounds.fTop) * fRowBytes;
00052         }
00053 
00054         static U8*      AllocImage(size_t bytes);
00055         static void     FreeImage(U8* image);
00056 };
00057 
00058 #endif
